project.description:
Generate the rosdistro cache and make it available.
Generated from buildfarm/resources/static_jobs. Do not edit on Jenkins but in the repository.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y python-rosdistro
INDEX_URL=`python -c "import rosdistro; print(rosdistro.get_index_url())"` rosdistro_build_cache $INDEX_URL --debug
ROS_DISTROS=`python -c "import rosdistro; print(' '.join(rosdistro.get_index(rosdistro.get_index_url()).distributions.keys()))"` for ROS_DISTRO in $ROS_DISTROS; do #scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -qr `pwd`/$ROS_DISTRO-cache.yaml rosbot@ros.osuosl.org:/var/www/www.ros.org/rosdistro/ scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -qr `pwd`/$ROS_DISTRO-cache.yaml.gz rosbot@ros.osuosl.org:/var/www/www.ros.org/rosdistro/ done
